about_the_game:
Step into Eldralith with the Luck & Loot demo, a dice-builder roguelike where every roll shapes your fate. Play as Tirnaya, a fierce warrior battling through the first three corrupted dungeons, customizing her dice and uncovering the dark magic entwined with her past.

Nostalgic Roguelike With a Dice-Building Twist

Craft your perfect dice by swapping faces and unlocking powerful abilities. As you fight through Eldralith's twisted forests and haunted swamps, every decision brings you closer to mastering the cycle—or succumbing to it.

What’s in the Demo:

  • 1 Hero: Play as Tirnaya, the fiery warrior with a haunted lineage.

  • 3 Dungeons: Explore the eerie Forgotten Forest, the fetid Swamp of Despair, and the cursed Graveyard of Echoes.

  • Endless Replayability: Customize Tirnaya's dice, collect powerful relics, and face corrupted foes in procedurally generated realms.

  • Chiptune Charm & Pixel Peril: Immerse yourself in a 1-bit dark fantasy world with a nostalgic soundtrack.

Will you shatter the cycle—or become another soul lost to despair?

Roll the dice and face your fate in the Luck & Loot demo. Love what you play?
Wishlist the full game now to unlock more heroes, dungeons, and challenges in Eldralith's endless struggle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Luck & Loot is under development and the minimum requirements might change before a full release.

short_description: Luck & Loot is a dice-building roguelike set in a 1-bit dark fantasy world. Craft and customize powerful dice, collect game-changing relics, and battle corrupted foes across procedurally generated dungeons.
